alert.note: Alert for Mariposa (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 9:05AM PDT until May 24 at 1:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Merced River At Happy Isles affecting Mariposa County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles, Pohono Bridge...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merced River At Happy Isles. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Campgrounds at North Pines and Housekeeping Camp begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM PDT Monday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 8.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning by 1000 AM PDT.
